Package proj

Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
proj.Vehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bicycle, Electric
public class Vehicle extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an vehicle in the mobility service. This class serves as the base for all vehicle types (e.g., Bicycle, Electric) and holds common properties such as a unique identifier and its current location. It defines an abstract contract for calculating rental costs, which is implemented through a double dispatch mechanism involving the User class. This class is Serializable to support object persistence.
See Also:

    • getHourlyRate

      public double getHourlyRate(User user)
      Gets the specific hourly rental rate for this vehicle by initiating a double dispatch. It calls the corresponding getPrice method on the User object, passing itself as an argument. This allows the User subclass to determine the correct price based on its own pricing rules and the vehicle's type.
      Parameters:
      user - The User who is renting the vehicle.
      Returns:
      The hourly rate in Euros.

    • toString

      Returns a string representation of the Vehicle.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing the vehicle's ID and location.
